main.name: Raysa Aurrecochea
main.description: currently employed by Fitch Solutions where I push pixels, shuffle data and talk to my rubber duck until everything works
main.bio: I'm a water sports/caribbean weather lover with a passion for coding and learning experiences. Born in Havana, Cuba, I made my move to the States where I work now as a Front End Software Developer for Fitch Group. I love to be challange because chances are I'm going to learn and grow from it. Outside of work I'm an avid kitesurfer, yogi and nature lover. I love to travel and explore new places to connect with different cultures and people.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.
main.warningMsg: Warning: Contact form not yet configured, please contact me via normal email for now

work.title: Front-End Software Developer
work.description: Establish appropriate office hours to deliver effective training to cross-functional team members for seamless on-boarding onto web-client codebase. Oversee the development and deployment of roadmap deliverables within scope and timelines through collaboration with stakeholders, team members, and UX resources.

work.title: Front-End Software Developer
work.description: Maximized client/user experience by maintaining the website. Participated in scrum ceremonies like daily standups, grooming sessions, sprint planning, and sprint retrospective.

work.title: Front-End Software Developer
work.description: Managed and streamlined the project by gathering all visual and functional requirements. Increased browser support after a rewrite of customer-targeted marketing emails and turned the website into a Single Page Application (SPA).

testimonials.text: Raysa and I were part of the same team at Fullstack Academy. I was incredibly impressed by her work ethic and dedication to the pursuit of her education. The amount of time and effort she put in was clearly visible in the quality of her work and served as an inspiration for me. I would gladly work together with her again and I know that she will be a great role model for future developers!
